DOC.brief_summary: This laboratory study use gene expression profile identify different category Wilms tumor . Studying gene express sample tumor tissue patient cancer may help doctor identify biomarkers related cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Gene Expression Profiles Categorize Wilms Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Identify new molecular category Wilms tumor ( WT ) base gene expression profile sample patient disease . II . Develop classify system ( classifier ) predict define number clinically relevant category base expression establish set gene . III . Confirm test classifier analysis gene several different methodology , use additional patient sample outside case/cohort posse clinically scientifically relevant parameter . IV . Validate use classifier predict define group within second set sample ( investigator blind clinical biological data ) subsequent comparison true incidence pertinent marker . OUTLINE : Three hundred tumor specimen analyze genetic expression profile use Affymetrix assay . Specific gene identify classifier analyze use tissue array . An additional 300 specimen examine gene expression categorize accord classifier .
DOC.criteria: Specimens patient previously enrol `` On Study '' `` Followed Biology Only '' protocol NWTSG5 ( COGQ9401 ) Study followup data disease status available National Wilms Tumor Study Group/Children 's Oncology Group pathology review show `` favorable '' histology Sufficient biology sample available without use biology bank reserve
